definition: Definition: "Finally" or "at last"; an adverb used to express relief or satisfaction when something desired or anticipated has happened or is happening. It is commonly used to convey a sense of long-awaited completion or achievement.

examples.german: Ich habe endlich meinen FÃ¼hrerschein bestanden.
examples.english: I finally passed my driver's license.

examples.german: Endlich habe ich genug Geld gespart, um mir ein neues Auto zu kaufen.
examples.english: Finally, I have saved enough money to buy a new car.

examples.german: Endlich habe ich meinen Traumjob gefunden.
examples.english: Finally, I have found my dream job.

examples.german: Endlich kann ich meine Familie wiedersehen.
examples.english: Finally, I can see my family again.
